ai-tha-ap347:1.4_0: like a tree at the foot of a tree.
ai-tha-ap347:2.2_0: I’ll cover it with a sharp knife,
ai-tha-ap347:2.3_0: I was walking up and down the path,
ai-tha-ap347:2.4_0: or stood in the mango grove.
ai-tha-ap347:3.2_0: which delights in the heavenly realm.
ai-tha-ap347:3.4_0: acting as ruler of the gods.
ai-tha-ap347:6.1_0: After rejoicing the two offerings together:
ai-tha-ap347:6.2_0: you’ve been accused like a tortoise:
ai-tha-ap347:6.4_0: I went forth in the teaching of the Dhamma.
ai-tha-ap347:9.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Nandā.
ai-tha-ap347:10.1_0: The fifth Elder Nun Nun Cūḷaka
